enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: COP-6 then adopted its agenda, with the exception of item 5 'Second review of adequacy of Article 4.2 (a) and (b) of the Convention' that the G-77/China has proposed to amend as 'review of the adequacy of implementation of Article 4, paragraph 2 (a) and (b) of the Convention'.
President Pronk said he would consult on this issue.
